com.io7m.r2.filters

Class R2FilterBilateralBlurDepthAwareParameters<SD extends R2RenderTargetDescriptionType,S extends R2RenderTargetUsableType<SD>,DD extends R2RenderTargetDescriptionType,D extends R2RenderTargetUsableType<DD>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.r2.filters.R2FilterBilateralBlurDepthAwareParameters<SD,S,DD,D>
  • Type Parameters:
    SD - The type of source render target descriptions
    S - The type of source render targets
    DD - The type of destination render target descriptions
    D - The type of destination render targets
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    R2FilterBilateralBlurDepthAwareParametersType<SD,S,DD,D>

    @Generated(value={"Immutables.generator","R2FilterBilateralBlurDepthAwareParametersType<SD, S, DD, D>"})
public final class R2FilterBilateralBlurDepthAwareParameters<SD extends R2RenderTargetDescriptionType,S extends R2RenderTargetUsableType<SD>,DD extends R2RenderTargetDescriptionType,D extends R2RenderTargetUsableType<DD>>
extends Object
implements R2FilterBilateralBlurDepthAwareParametersType<SD,S,DD,D>

    Parameters for bilateral blur filters that blur render targets of type S and write the blurred results to render targets of type T.
